sqlMap.select: select f_character_id, f_nicheng, f_shengri, f_sex, f_xiexing, f_shengfen, f_chengshi, f_zhiye, f_yuanxiao, f_mail, f_http, f_qq, f_lianxihaoma, f_baomichengdu, f_size, f_url, f_shenhe, f_age, f_update_time from t_personals where f_character_id = #characterId#
sqlMap.insert: insert into t_personals (f_character_id, f_nicheng, f_shengri, f_sex, f_xiexing, f_shengfen, f_chengshi, f_zhiye, f_yuanxiao, f_mail, f_http, f_qq, f_lianxihaoma, f_baomichengdu, f_size, f_url, f_shenhe, f_age, f_update_time) values (#characterId:INTEGER#, #nicheng:VARCHAR#, #shengri:VARCHAR#, #sex:INTEGER#, #xiexing:CHAR#, #shengfen:VARCHAR#, #chengshi:VARCHAR#, #zhiye:VARCHAR#, #yuanxiao:VARCHAR#, #mail:VARCHAR#, #http:VARCHAR#, #qq:VARCHAR#, #lianxihaoma:VARCHAR#, #baomichengdu:INTEGER#, #size:VARCHAR#, #url:VARCHAR#, #shenhe:INTEGER#, #age:INTEGER#, #updateTime:VARCHAR#)
sqlMap.update:
update t_personals
f_nicheng = #nicheng:VARCHAR#
f_shengri = #shengri:VARCHAR#
f_sex = #sex:INTEGER#
f_xiexing = #xiexing:CHAR#
f_shengfen = #shengfen:VARCHAR#
f_chengshi = #chengshi:VARCHAR#
f_zhiye = #zhiye:VARCHAR#
f_yuanxiao = #yuanxiao:VARCHAR#
f_mail = #mail:VARCHAR#
f_http = #http:VARCHAR#
f_qq = #qq:VARCHAR#
f_lianxihaoma = #lianxihaoma:VARCHAR#
f_baomichengdu = #baomichengdu:INTEGER#
f_size = #size:VARCHAR#
f_url = #url:VARCHAR#
f_shenhe = #shenhe:INTEGER#
f_age = #age:INTEGER#
f_update_time = #updateTime:VARCHAR#
where f_character_id = #characterId:INTEGER#
